alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew; Brown; Greene; Jackson; Jennings; Lawrence; Martin; Monroe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 8:03AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Monroe, southeastern Brown, southwestern Bartholomew, northern Martin, southeastern Greene, Lawrence, Jackson and southwestern Jennings Counties through 845 AM EDT... At 802 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Shoals to Seymour. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Seymour around 810 AM EDT. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 37 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bartholomew; Brown; Greene; Jackson; Jennings; Lawrence; Martin; Monroe
